title: Premium Features!
explanation: This is a third party version of Incognito, which has an optional premium subscription. Those features are listed below.

title: Languages
explanation: Translations into Spanish and Japanese (May not be 100% accurate.)

title: Account
explanation: You can have your own account, which allows you to friend other users!

title: Early access to new features
explanation: You will be able to have new features when they are in beta/early access.

title: Made By ...
explanation: Possibly made by a team of people...
